definition: ancient stone acupuncture needle/to criticize/to pierce
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Where does turban sell stone needle hand chain?
The some acupuncture treatments that disappeared more than 2000 years ago have been rediscovered, and are being used today.
sentences.chinese: 砭石療法已失傳兩千年了，如今又被人們重新發現。

definition: cupping glass/fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion

acupuncture point (any point on any meridian)/category of 12 specific acupuncture points near the wrist or ankle, each lying on a different meridian (one of five categories collectively termed 五輸穴|五输穴)
suction cup (used in Chinese medicine to draw the blood and qi 氣|气)/detachable suction chimney to make a stove draw
